name: Come On! Heroes
synopsis: In a green field there is this small hill, and on the hill there are flowers...wait, where have the flowers gone? It must have been the Heiress. This lively Heiress snuck out of the family mansion, to follow a burglar out of curiosity. The burglar, Archer, immediately decided to kidnap the Heiress for ransom, and ordered his men to handle her with care. The Heiress is happy in Archerâ€™s mansion. She doesn't realise her position, so she orders his men around. In the meantime, her father (Mr King) has received Archer's message and announced that anyone who brings back his daughter will receive a great reward. So a bunch of men, including those from other wealthy families, lead their men to Archer's mansion...
